entry.title: Monin - Peach Tea Concentrate - 750 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Monin
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 9.99

Quickly and easily make popular iced tea drinks with this Monin peach tea concentrate!

Featuring notes of ripe, juicy peach and black tea, this concentrate offers the perfect way to create delicious, well balanced lemon iced tea beverages in your diner, bakery, hotel, or office. Packaged in a glass bottle, this concentrate boasts a sleek appearance for an attractive shelf presence and can easily be paired with a compatible pump for quick, efficient service during peak serving hours.

Easy to Prepare

Simply fill a glass with ice, and mix 1 oz. concentrate with 7 oz. water. Stir well and you're ready to serve! It is conveniently pre-sweetened with pure cane sugar, making it an easy one step solution to serving quality iced tea in your establishment. Each bottle makes approximately (25) 8 oz. drinks.

Sweet and refreshing, guests are sure to love this easy-sipping beverage!

Monin - Peach Tea Concentrate - 750 ml

entry.title: Monin - Cold Brewed Coffee Concentrate - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Monin
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 26.99

Quickly and easily make popular espresso-based drinks with this Monin cold brew coffee concentrate!

While it may be difficult to make lattes and mochas with the right balance of rich espresso flavor, this concentrate does the work for you so you'll have a consistent drink every time. With little to no equipment necessary to make delicious iced coffee or frozen specialty beverages, this concentrate offers a great way to sell gourmet espresso-based drinks at your concession stand, convenience store, bakery, as well as your office's or hotel's coffee bar.

Fresh, Gourmet Flavor

This cold brew concentrate offers a complex, rich, and balanced espresso flavor with a freshly roasted coffee aroma. It is the perfect option for adding sweetness and flavor without sugar or calories. Containing low net carbs (0-2), this concentrate is a delicious solution for today’s sugar and carb-conscious lifestyles. Gourmet roasted, cold extracted, and unsweetened, Monin brings you a truly delectable cold brew concentrate to offer your guests iced coffee with the premium flavor they want, and the ready-to-mix convenience you need.

Easy to Prepare

Ready to drink with the addition of just milk or water, this cold brew concentrate provides your patrons with a delicious iced espresso-based drink in a matter of minutes. Due to its simple preparation, with no equipment necessary, and the ability to make up to 33 servings with 1 bottle, this cold brew concentrate is essential in your establishment!

Monin - Cold Brewed Coffee Concentrate -  1 L

entry.title: Monin - Iced Coffee Concentrate - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Monin
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 25.99

Quickly and easily serve up iced coffee drinks with this Monin iced coffee concentrate!

This concentrate makes it easy way to serve consistently great-tasting coffee to your patrons. With little to no equipment necessary to make delicious iced coffee or frozen specialty beverages, this concentrate offers a great way to sell gourmet iced coffee at your concession stand, convenience store, bakery, as well as your office's or hotel's coffee bar.

Fresh, Gourmet Flavor

This iced coffee concentrate is made with 100% arabica beans and offers a rich, full-bodied flavor with a freshly brewed coffee aroma. Gourmet roasted, cold extracted, and lightly sweetened with pure cane sugar, this concentrate provides an easy one step solution to serving high quality iced coffee in your establishment. In addition to coffee, this concentrate can also be used to create frappes, dessert cocktails, and even flavored icings.

Easy to Prepare

Ready to drink with the addition of just milk or water, this iced coffee concentrate provides your patrons with a delicious, caffeinated beverage in a matter of minutes. Due to its simple preparation, with no equipment necessary, and the ability to make up to 33 servings with 1 bottle, this iced coffee concentrate is essential in your establishment!

Monin - Ice Coffee Concentrate -  1 L

entry.title: Monin - Chai Tea Concentrate Syrup - 750 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Monin
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 9.99

Quickly and easily make popular chai drinks with this Monin chai tea 7:1 concentrate!

Featuring notes of clove, cinnamon, and ginger, this aromatic concentrate offers the perfect way to create delicious, well balanced chai tea beverages in your diner, bakery, hotel, or office. Packaged in a glass bottle, this concentrate boasts a sleek appearance for an attractive shelf presence and can easily be paired with a compatible pump for quick, efficient service during peak serving hours.

Easy to Prepare

To make a hot chai tea, simply add 1.5 oz. concentrate to a cup and stir in steamed milk. For an iced chai, simply fill a glass with ice, mix 0.5 oz. concentrate with water, stir, and serve. It is conveniently pre-sweetened with pure cane sugar, making it an easy one step solution to serving quality chai tea in your establishment. Each bottle makes approximately (25) 8 oz. drinks.

This delicious spiced punch is perfect for serving at your winter and fall events!

Monin - Chai Tea (Masala Chai) Concentrate Syrup - 750 ml

entry.title: Monin - Margarita Mix Syrup - 64 Oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Monin
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 31.99

Bring exotic citrus flavor to your beverages with this Monin premium Margarita flavoring syrup!

This syrup provides a quick and easy way to add exciting new flavor and a vibrant color to a variety of your handcrafted cocktails, sodas, iced teas, and lemonades. Made with pure cane sugar and no artificial ingredients, this all natural syrup will enhance the flavor profile of your mixed or blended drinks without overpowering them or being too sweet. You can even use this syrup to create deliciously sweet popsicles, sorbets, or glazes for entrees! Packaged in a shatterproof plastic bottle, this flavoring syrup is an excellent addition to any restaurant, bar, coffee shop, or cafe. It boasts a sleek appearance for an attractive shelf presence and can easily be paired with a compatible pump for quick, efficient service during peak serving hours.
